paragraphs: Through my projects, you’ll see how much I value creative problem-solving, finding new paths where others might stop, and always pushing further to reach a better solution. I live by a line that guides me every day: “Nothing's scary if you face it first.” – GT. That’s why I don’t turn away from challenges—I chase them, knowing that every obstacle holds something to learn.
A Mechatronics Engineer from UCSI University in Malaysia. My journey has led me across many fields—from AI and embedded systems to 3D design and smart controls.

quote.text: Nothing's scary if you face it first.
quote.author: GT
quote.sub: Fear only lives in what we haven't faced yet
